Reviews.Title: “Great Location, wonderful staff - a gem”

Reviews.Content: stayed night quick trip family staying london week staff incredibly helpful hotel corner seasons half price beautiful bathrooms modern size balcony fresh air view restaurant yummy breakfast overall stay size style beautiful bathrooms location value staff wonderful thanks accommodating family 5

Reviews.Title: “Take me back to this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: kimhunter
Reviews.Content: stayed days husband arrived stay tour de france feel welcome comfortable staff staff amazing lost luggage coming australia 2 days staff helpful assisting chase airlines willing assist husband storing bike picked transport company trouble spacious clean bright comfortable modern bathroom huge balcony lovely fresh air view tower location shopping especially lounge dining gorgeous stay perfect

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Location and wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Claudia R
Reviews.Content: husband stayed weekend hotel de sers location minutes walk champs elysees eiffel tower shops avenue montaigne lovely walk louvre practically door georges 4 seasons 12 price entire staff incredibly friendly helpful changing restaurant reservations feel home lovely junior suite 2 bathrooms probably recommendations honesty staff lost valuable diamond earring people front desk importantly housekeepers helpful spent hour scouring lifting mattress box springs looking trash cans promised faith trust checked day sent home hotel followed email left tell continued look unfortunately hadnt found happily found earring home unpacked truly confident returned awesome location wonderful people lovely husband highly recommend hotel de sers stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Expensive but Enjoyable in the centre of Paris”
Reviews.Author: SimonPSurrey
Reviews.Content: stayed business recently impressed quality standards hotel directly corner grand george seasons price tag understood famous personality hotel whilst staying wont probably comes screaming crowds reception feels narrow walk goes decent lounge centre restaurant bar rear breakfast hotel expensive glam quid grab breakfast road decent front double huge bed usual nice touches lighting options throw lighting technician lovely bathroom shower lovely maybe tad paris

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Boutique Hotel Located at the heart of Paris!”
Reviews.Author: Marwan A
Reviews.Content: boutique hotel stay worried hotel door george 5 min walk george metro station hotel offers spacious excellent service package included continental breakfast delicious concierge hotel helpful truly 5 star amazing hotel terrace nice view nice sitting

Reviews.Title: “Amazing moments”

Reviews.Content: book hotel de sers wedding anniversary welcome benoit reception desk junior suite special occasion manager send bottle champagne chocolat fauchon parisian try restaurant spend nice moment bar try cocktail esteban nice location hotel amazing champs elysees avenue walking distance beautifull eiffel tower honeymoon wedding anniversary perfect thanks lot moment amazing wife

Reviews.Title: “We liked this hotel more and more each day”
Reviews.Author: kakaface
Reviews.Content: sticker shock essentially solid half star hotel grew love location superb staff friendly accommodating bed comfortable charming courtyard cafe meal cocktail cats

Reviews.Title: “Not absolutely a 5* plush hotel”
Reviews.Author: STARATHENS
Reviews.Content: 5 luxuries services atmosphere weve booked 2 5 nights 21st january backside view 1st 66 balcony 2nd 67 corridor proudly called superiors double wasnt possibility change temperature bathroom curtain coffee tea maker welcome bottle water overpriced soft drinks water fridge 78 euros nevertheless hot camomile brought immediately didnt charge cost 8 euros try paul champs elysees av 3 euros grand coffee 450 real french banquette sandwich excellent reception staff perfect cleanliness 34 minutes walking champs elysees av george metro station

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Paris”
Reviews.Author: CarlosD77
Reviews.Content: chance discover hotel de sers 3 ago hotels perfect cozy sophisticated atmosphere professional attentive staff incredible location beautiful delightful details moment enter definately recommended hope visit soon thanks

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel running paris marathon contacted book massages run couldnt helpful particularly arrived greeted friends looked porridge bananas phase breakfast beautifully location fantastic champs elysee liked friendliness central location wouldnt branded hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great design but don't expect luxury or top-notch service.”
Reviews.Author: Frescocat
Reviews.Content: time stayed hotel du sers business purposes design ambience boutique hotel indeed feel boutique famous dining drinking bar expect luxury top notch service time fine service issues time price approx 400 euro bog standard expect excel customer service five colleagues experienced water temperature mornings showering mine scolding hot theirs freezing cold curtain bathroom window meaning view opposite pee dark breakfast farce sole waiter run feet restaurant resulting waits wrong taking service bookings whilst serving carrying portable phone breakfast day arrived late told omelette available chef didnt start 8am 7 30am warned instead basket fat laden croissants breads trying avoid doctors hence omelette apology am paris practically weekly business purposes service paying 150 euro elsewhere luxury hotel multinational visit colleagues ensured hotel struck supplier list

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 5 star hotels world doesnt close 3 star 5 star location nights row housekeeping missed service pillows beds tiny hard mattresses thin hard fitness treadmill piece equipment temperature sauna service dishes left hallway entire day overlooked hotel restaurant loud music conversation told front desk loud sleep quietest hotel concierge couldnt reservation requested restaurant failed tell suggest alternative late hotel recommmend

Reviews.Title: “Great Boutique Hotel in the High Rent District”
Reviews.Author: Neptune170
Reviews.Content: wife spent week hotel de sers absolutely loved hotel district corner seasons price reasonable comfortable wellappointed standards roomy bathroom excellent tub separate shower extremely quiet heard street noise barely heard staff heard guest staff extremely helpful friendly arrived am able ready 1030 wonderful exhausted overnight flight throughout stay accomodating real air conditioning dribble air airconditioned hotels paris set thermostat 68 night slept wonderfully negative terribly close attractions importantly metro stations metro blocks direction fine weather day walk 5 blocks rain metro hotel eat restaurant neighborhood paid 80 salad club sandwich beers local restaurants district absolutely loved hotel stay am lucky return paris recommend reservation pun intended

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location - lovely hotel though not 'French' in style...”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel december 2009 company kick event hotel positioned corner george hotel welcoming plush laid roomy mod cons bathroom biggest price charged breakfast €40 top careful honestly nip proper french breakfast coffee €15 corner hotel provided paris beautiful city
